name: TECHNUCLEAR
description:
TECHNUCLEAR

Split atoms using the unlimited power of TECHNO MUSIC

Click and drag to launch the ball. Collide with the atoms to split them.

WARNING : flashing images might cause discomfort, consider toggling off  visual effects in the settings.

For the best audio experience, play the Windows version, with headphone (warning, might be loud)

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 49 Compo
